name: A Game with Dice
description:
Quick Description

A Game with Dice is an intriguing puzzle game.

By connecting and matching the top faces of dice together you create a chain. Once the chain is greater or equal to the top face, the dice will be removed.

Note

In the interest of honesty, I've been working on the mechanics of this game the last few weeks and it happened to fit nicely into the theme of the GMTK Jam. The previously written code was not written intentionally for this Jam, and is simply coincidence that it fits the theme.

This build is for the Jam and features 15 completely new puzzles build over the Jam weekend, in addition to survival mode and a brand new tutorial.
